Denver Post Broncos Twitter

Meet the Bloggers

Follow @TroyRenck Broncos Writer

Troy joined The Denver Post in 2002 as the Rockies' beat writer and moved to the Denver Broncos beat in the 2014-15 season.

Follow @nickijhabvala Broncos writer

Nicki Jhabvala is a Broncos beat writer for The Denver Post. She was previously the digital news editor for sports. Before arriving in Denver, she spent five years at Sports Illustrated working primarily as its online NBA editor. She also spent two years as a home page editor at the New York Times.

og.description: All the action from the Windy City as Brock Osweiler prepares for his career start, against former coaches John Fox and Adam Gase.
og.title: Broncos vs. Bears: Pregame sights, sounds from Chicago
